div.ab: [- - -] of these, 25 11/16 arourai [- - -];Left, in corn-taxed lands, [- - - arourai] of private land, 31 5/24 artabai of wheat, of which:;of sown land, 12 1/16(?) arourai of catoecic land at 1 artaba of wheat per aroura [- - -]; of uninundated land, the rest, 7 2/3(?) arourai [[of catoecic land]] at 1 1/2 artaba of wheat per aroura [- - -] Didymos, the "hard worker", through Serenus [- - -] 6 5/8 arourai sown(?); Heras, the man of the didrachmia, through [- - -]; equal the aforesaid (arourai) declared similarly to the sheets [- - - neighbors] of the whole with the existing . . .
